about_the_game:
This DLC adds a new artifact to the game: "Shield of Great Protectors"

Lore: This artifact appeared when the Red Horde insidiously attacked the young Kingdom. The orcs thought that the human race would not withstand even a couple of days against their power. However, unity and desire to protect their home empower people to stop anything and everyone

Effect: The target loses the ability to attack for a short time

Fullmetal Developer: Hello, my name is Taras and I am Ukrainian. During recent events, I was inspired by seeing how bravely people are defending our home, our country! So, I decided to create this shield to glorify their image.

I will use the Income from this DLC to help people affected by this war.

Fullmetal Developer: Hello, my name is Taras and I am Ukrainian. During recent events, I was inspired by seeing how bravely people are defending our home, our country! So, I decided to create this shield to glorify their image.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer. (32x or 64x)
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This shield appeared when the Red Horde insidiously attacked the young Kingdom. The orcs thought that the human race would not withstand even a couple of days against their power. However, unity and desire to protect their home empower people to stop anything and everyone
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Greek, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Bulgarian, Danish, Finnish, Hungarian, Korean, Polish, Swedish
